greetings.hello: Hello! How can I assist you today?
greetings.hi: Hi there! What can I do for you?

questions.what is your favorite color: I don't have a favorite color, but I'm here to answer your questions!
questions.tell me a joke: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
questions.how does photosynthesis work: Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert sunlight into energy. It involves a complex series of chemical reactions...
questions.what is the meaning of life: The meaning of life is a philosophical question that has been debated for centuries. It can have different meanings for different people.
questions.tell me a fun fact: Sure, here's a fun fact: Honey never spoils. Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still perfectly edible!
questions.show me a cute picture: Sure, here's a link to a cute  picture: [ Picture](https://media.istockphoto.com/id/1472932742/photo/group-of-multigenerational-people-hugging-each-others-support-multiracial-and-diversity.jpg?s=1024x1024&w=is&k=20&c=y0iPjg_awDHw2Ps96JgMUXRvM5WoCeNA-4MgbUelbVY=)
questions.video: Of course! Here's a link to a  video: [Funny Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ea9jgBjQxEs&t=592s)
questions.watch a video: Of course! Here's a link to a  video: [Funny Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ea9jgBjQxEs&t=592s)

compliments.you are smart: Thank you! I'm here to provide information and assist you.
compliments.you are helpful: I'm glad to be of help!
compliments.you are amazing: You're too kind! How can I assist you today?
compliments.you are the best: Thank you! I'm here to assist you to the best of my abilities.
compliments.you are awesome: You're pretty awesome too! How can I assist you?
compliments.you are great: I'm here to make your day great! What can I do for you?

weather.what's the weather like today: I'm sorry, I don't have access to real-time weather information. You can check a weather website or app for the current weather.
weather.will it rain tomorrow: I can't provide weather forecasts. Please check a reliable weather source for that information.

thankyou.thank you: You're welcome! If you have more questions, feel free to ask.
thankyou.thanks: You're welcome! How can I assist you further?
thankyou.appreciate it: I'm here to help. Let me know if there's anything else I can do for you.

default: I'm not sure how to respond to that. Can you please rephrase your question?
